channel.title: About the Feedback/Suggestions category
channel.description:
What can we reasonably do to improve your experience?
- Post here to provide feedback and suggestions about how we can reasonably improve the game with an indie budget.
- Note that this is **not for bug reports!** Report bugs at #bug-reports
- Tell us what we can do and why it would improve not only your experience, but everyone else's.

item.title: About the Feedback/Suggestions category
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
What can we reasonably do to improve your experience?

  • Post here to provide feedback and suggestions about how we can reasonably improve the game with an indie budget.

  • Note that this is not for bug reports! Report bugs at #bug-reports

  • Tell us what we can do and why it would improve not only your experience, but everyone else’s.

Read full topic
